data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Laikipia, Kenya.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Laikipia, Kenya

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 198,020 believers in Laikipia against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Father, help the 198,020 believers in Laikipia to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 399,200 citizens of Laikipia, Kenya, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Arab, Yemeni people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Arab, Yemeni people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Arab, Yemeni people is yours.
Spirit, encourage every believer in Laikipia, Kenya to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 198,020 believers find a person of peace today among the 201,180 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Laikipia do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

location.name: Laikipia
location.people_groups_list: Munyoyaya, Somali, Gujarati, Ilwana, Arab, Hadrami
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Munyoyaya (2,100), Somali (3,050,000), Gujarati (212,000), Ilwana (22,000), Arab, Hadrami (13,000)
